price: 31.  N’ont-ils donc pas vu combien de générations Nous avons fait périr avant eux et qu’ils ne verront plus vers eux revenir ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarjiʿūna
